医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示，疫苗接种和行为改变相结合，避免了美国 64% 的麻疹病例当前针对猴痘（Mpox）的预防措施组合的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Combined-vaccination-and-behavior-change-efforts-averted-6425-of-US-mpox-cases-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Combined-vaccination-and-behavior-change-efforts-averted-6425-of-US-mpox-cases-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c58858a-088d-437f-925e-815a57ae1768 Wed, 10 Jan 2024 08:31:00 -0500 Combined vaccination and behavior change efforts averted 64% of US mpox cases, study reveals
含有 IgA 抗体的滴鼻剂可以预防 COVID-19 和未来的变种瑞典卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员表明，含有 IgA 抗体的滴鼻剂可以保护小鼠免受 SARS-CoV-2 感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Nasal-drops-with-IgA-antibodies-may-protect-against-COVID-19-and-future-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Nasal-drops-with-IgA-antibodies-may-protect-against-COVID-19-and-future-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4448959-e19c-49d6-81dc-257ccc18fbbb Wed, 10 Jan 2024 08:13:59 -0500 Nasal drops with IgA antibodies may protect against COVID-19 and future variants
新研究发现母体疫苗和单克隆抗体对婴儿 RSV 有效孕产妇疫苗接种 (MV) 对长效单克隆抗体 (la-mAB) 治疗的影响和成本效益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/New-study-finds-maternal-vaccine-and-monoclonal-antibody- effective-against-RSV-in-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/New-study-finds-maternal-vaccine-and-monoclonal-antibody- effective-against-RSV-in-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f187cf64-8f60-4b5c-a2ab-363d764fd5fa Wed, 10 Jan 2024 08:07:00 -0500 New study finds maternal vaccine and monoclonal antibody effective against RSV in infants
儿童饮食模式影响青春期动脉僵硬度英国心脏基金会 (BHF) 资助的研究表明，儿童时期高热量、高脂肪和高糖的饮食可能会损害血管功能，从而增加早期心脏病发作和中风的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Childhood-dietary-patterns-influence-arterial-stiffness-in-adolescent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Childhood-dietary-patterns-influence-arterial-stiffness-in-adolescent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34562c35-cc06-43a7-ae3d-3c10a6427da4 Wed, 10 Jan 2024 08:02:00 -0500 Childhood dietary patterns influence arterial stiffness in adolescence
维也纳医科大学的研究人员发现慢性炎症性肠病的可能触发因素由于克罗恩病或溃疡性结肠炎等慢性炎症性肠病 (IBD) 的病因尚不清楚，目前对患者的治疗旨在减轻经常令人痛苦的症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/MedUni-Vienna-researchers-discover-possible-trigger-of-chronic-itis-bowel-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/MedUni-Vienna-researchers-discover-possible-trigger-of-chronic-itis-bowel-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80cc3cd5-2b03-4af8-8f85-dccfab26671d Wed, 10 Jan 2024 07:59:03 -0500 MedUni Vienna researchers discover possible trigger of chronic inflammatory bowel disease
研究将患者特征与绕过最近的乳腺癌治疗中心的可能性联系起来研究人员调查了与乳腺癌手术治疗地点相关的医院质量和患者因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Study-links- Patient-characteristics-with-the-likelihood-of-bypassing-the-nearest-surgical-center-for-breast-cancer-treatment。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Study-links- Patient-characteristics-with-the-likelihood-of-bypassing-the-nearest-surgical-center-for-breast-cancer-treatment。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=500f0d22-6453-4b9c-bd06-b41656d51282 Wed, 10 Jan 2024 07:59:00 -0500 Study links patient characteristics with the likelihood of bypassing the nearest surgical center for breast cancer treatment
乳房X光检查人工智能可能会让患者付出额外的费用。这值得么？ 11 月份，当我在曼哈顿的一家放射诊所办理年度乳房 X 光检查时，审核我的文件的前台工作人员提出了一个意想不到的问题：我愿意花 40 美元对我的乳房 X 光检查进行人工智能分析吗？她补充说，这不在保险范围内。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Mammography-AI-can-cost-患者-extra-Is-it-worth-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Mammography-AI-can-cost-患者-extra-Is-it-worth-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9224823b-7a3c-4d21-8530-45656fe0f651 Wed, 10 Jan 2024 07:15:36 -0500 Mammography AI can cost patients extra. Is it worth it?
加州为找不到堕胎培训的住院医生提供了生命线布里亚·皮科克（Bria Peacock）选择了医学职业，因为这位佐治亚州黑人本地人看到了她所在社区的严峻健康需求——包括获得堕胎护理的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/California-offers-a-lifeline-for-medical-residents-who-cane28099t-find-abortion-training.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/California-offers-a-lifeline-for-medical-residents-who-cane28099t-find-abortion-training.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f8c58b0-c9d4-4ad9-a69b-b236668f30d4 Wed, 10 Jan 2024 07:14:19 -0500 California offers a lifeline for medical residents who can’t find abortion training
新算法被证明是检测和识别新型细菌生物体的强大工具研究人员开发了 NOVA 算法，使用传统方法（例如基质辅助激光解吸电离飞行时间质谱法和使用全基因组测序的部分 16S rRNA 基因测序）系统分析未鉴定的细菌分离株。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/New-algorithm-proves-to-be-a-powerful-tool-for-detection-and-identification-of-novel-bacterial-organisms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/New-algorithm-proves-to-be-a-powerful-tool-for-detection-and-identification-of-novel-bacterial-organisms.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6067456a-ad5a-4e60-8f1a-267264061359 Wed, 10 Jan 2024 07:00:00 -0500 New algorithm proves to be a powerful tool for detection and identification of novel bacterial organisms
研究表明芒果可减弱抗结肠癌的潜力芒果苷 (MF)（芒果）的化学预防潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Study-reveals-mangos-attenuates-pottial-against-colon-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Study-reveals-mangos-attenuates-pottial-against-colon-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1462afa8-a05d-4882-a87d-4d32ad3193ee Wed, 10 Jan 2024 06:53:00 -0500 Study reveals mangos attenuates potential against colon cancer
